text: FC Avangard Bziv () is an amateur Ukrainian football from Bziv, Baryshivka Raion. == History == The club was created in 2015.Avanhard (Bziv): Holder of the Kyiv region "treble" («Авангард» (Бзів): володар «требла» Київщини). AAFU. 25 July 2018 == Honours == * Ukrainian Amateur Cup ** Winners (1): 2018–19 * Kyiv Oblast Championship ** Winners (2): 2017,Avanhard Bziv. KOFF. 11 April 2017 2018 * Kyiv Oblast Cup ** Runners-up (1): 2017 == References == == External links == Category:Association football clubs established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Ukraine Category:Football clubs in Kiev Oblast Category:Amateur football clubs in Ukraine Category:Baryshivka Raion
title: FC Avanhard Bziv
